findings.title: ExpExponentCleanup
findings.description: Only the exponentiation operation with types smaller than 256 bits is impacted, resulting in difficult-to-predict behavior.

findings.title: NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder
findings.description: Functions calls where the return type is a multidimensional fixed-size array are impacted.
